original_title: Hitler's Last Secrets: Private Hitler's War
overview: Why, at the height of the battle for France in 1940, was Hitler driven to step aside from the battle to visit the graves of his fallen comrades and lead the General Staff on a tour of his old trenches from the Great War? This powerful film study proves comprehensively that, contrary to popular myth, Hitler was not a cowardly malingerer and oddball loner. He in fact served with distinction.
title: Hitler's Last Secrets: Private Hitler's War
